info.title: API URI: /banks/{BANK_ID}/products/PRODUCT_CODE
info.description: An Open Source API for Banks.  (c) TESOBE Ltd. 2011 - 2016. Licensed under the AGPL and commercial licences.  Decomposed from Master PSD2 Swagger (http://psd2.it/#psd2apps).  Generated by psd2-generator: https://github.com/ericbroda/psd2-generator

get.description:
Returns information about the financial products offered by a bank specified by BANK_ID and PRODUCT_CODE including:

  • Name
  • Code
  • Category
  • Family
  • Super Family
  • More info URL
  • Description
  • Terms and Conditions
  • License the data under this endpoint is released under Authentication is Optional
